thread.title: BRIEF-China Merchants Shekou Industrial Zone Plans Equity Investment Funds

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Merchants Shekou Industrial Zone Plans Equity Investment Funds

organizations.name: china merchants shekou industrial zone holdings co ltd

text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - China Merchants Shekou Industrial Zone Holdings Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT PLANS TO SET UP A SERIES OF EQUITY INVESTMENT FUNDS WORTH UP TO 10 BILLION YUAN ($1.54 billion) Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2FqlNuz Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.5050 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
